head: <style>
.orientation-warning {
display: none;
position: fixed;
top: 0;
left: 0;
width: 100%;
height: 100%;
background-color: #231F20;
color: white;
font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
text-align: center;
display: flex;
flex-direction: column;
justify-content: center;
align-items: center;
z-index: 9999;
padding: 20px;
box-sizing: border-box;
.orientation-warning img {
width: 80px;
height: 80px;
margin-bottom: 30px;
animation: rotate 1.5s infinite ease-in-out;
@keyframes rotate {
0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
90% { transform: rotate(90deg); }
100% { transform: rotate(90deg); }
@media (orientation: portrait) {
.orientation-warning { display: flex; }
#unity-container { display: none !important; }
</style>
<script>
(function() {
function checkOrientation() {
const warning = document.querySelector('.orientation-warning');
const unityContainer = document.getElementById('unity-container');
const isPortrait = window.innerHeight > window.innerWidth;
if (warning) warning.style.display = isPortrait ? 'flex' : 'none';
if (unityContainer) unityContainer.style.display = isPortrait ? 'none' : 'block';
// Проверка при загрузке и изменении размера
window.addEventListener('load', checkOrientation);
window.addEventListener('resize', checkOrientation);
// Совместимость с iOS
if (window.screen.orientation) {
window.screen.orientation.addEventListener('change', checkOrientation);
} else {
window.addEventListener('orientationchange', checkOrientation);
</script>
